sentences.en: By the age of sixteen he was the junior lightweight champion of Poland.
sentences.cn: 16岁时他已经是波兰的青少年组轻量级冠军。

sentences.en: For staying dry you'll want nice lightweight waterproofs to wear over your leathers.
sentences.cn: 为了不被淋湿，你需要在皮衣的外面套上一件轻便的防水服。

sentences.en: He changed from lightweight (under 71kg) to light middleweight (under 78kg).
sentences.cn: 他从轻量级（71公斤以下）转到了轻中量级（78公斤以下）。

sentences.en: He was a lightweight, a political simpleton.
sentences.cn: 他是个无名之辈，头脑简单的政客。

sentences.en: He was considered too lightweight for the job.
sentences.cn: 人们认为他资历太浅，不适合做这工作。

sentences.en: Hill considered Sam a lightweight, a real amateur.
sentences.cn: 希尔认为萨姆无足轻重，是个十足的生手。

sentences.en: Keep handy a lightweight sweater or cardigan.
sentences.cn: 手边备一件薄的套头毛衣或开襟毛衫。

sentences.en: Lightweight concrete is a development mainly of the last twenty years.
sentences.cn: 轻质混凝土主要是最近二十年来发展起来的.

sentences.en: Our clothes are lightweight, fashionable, practical for holidays.
sentences.cn: 我们的服装轻便、时尚，并且很适合度假时穿。

sentences.en: Some of the discussion in the book is lightweight and unconvincing.
sentences.cn: 书中的有些论述肤浅琐碎，毫无说服力。

sentences.en: The laboratory has designed, tested and evaluated a lightweight, low - yield fission device.
sentences.cn: 该试验室设计, 试验和鉴定了一种轻巧 、 低当量的裂变装置.

sentences.en: The Oxford eight is 〔 are 〕 using a new lightweight boat.
sentences.cn: 牛津八人划船队使用的是新的轻量船.

sentences.en: The vacant W.B.C. junior-lightweight title has been called off.
sentences.cn: 空缺的世界拳击理事会次轻量级头衔被取消了。

sentences.en: These are lightweight storage tanks and secondary structures in aircraft.
sentences.cn: 这些是轻质贮罐和飞机的附属构件.

sentences.en: These garden shears are lightweight and easy to use.
sentences.cn: 这些园丁剪刀又轻又好用.

words.tran_cn: 轻量级选手；无足轻重的人

phrases.tran_cn: 轻骨料混凝土；轻质集料混凝土

trans.tran_cn: 轻量级选手，不重要的人
trans.tran_en: a boxer who weighs less than 61.24 kilograms, and who is heavier than a featherweight but lighter than a welterweight
